name: Improved Snap Shot

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Dex 15, Point-Blank Shot, Rapid Shot, Snap Shot, Weapon Focus, base attack bonus +9.

sections.body: You threaten an additional 10 feet with Snap Shot.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: Making a ranged attack provokes attacks of opportunity.
sections.name: Normal

description: You can take advantage of your opponent's vulnerabilities from a greater distance, and without exposing yourself.
